resources.string: I could not stabilize the image.\nMaybe you were moving the camera.\nPlease try again.

Camera permission is required to make a "live photo". If you do not provide this permission, you will not be able to use the application.
Access to the phone\'s internal memory is necessary to save "live photos" to the gallery. You can send the video to social networks right away. For this, access is not required.
File permission is required to save "live photos" to the gallery. You did not grant this permission.
Camera permission is required to make a "live photo". Without this permission, work with the application is impossible.
